Skills: I have been working for 15+ years as a front-end developer and sometimes product designer for various companies and my own projects. I used many front-end technologies while developing some projects. But after these years I decided that I want to continue to my career working for design teams. I experienced agile methodologies like scrum and kanban. Now, I'm design system lead at Hepsiburada in Turkey.
Figma, Sketch, Zeplin, Invision, Framer X, Sublime (Mac Os), Adobe Photoshop, Dreamweaver, Mac Os X, Visual Studio, Firebug, AutoCAD
